channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Not Time’s Fool: A Rare Version of a Shakespeare Sonnet Is Discovered
item.description: An Oxford researcher found a rare, handwritten variation of one of Shakespeare’s most famous love poems. About 400 years ago, its meaning might have b...

item.title: World’s Largest Iceberg Runs Aground
item.description: A massive superberg, four times as big as New York City, has halted east of the southern tip of South America.

item.title: Target CEO joins swarm of Fortune 500 executives warning of bigger bills as Trump’s tariff fallout hits the grocery aisle
item.description: Target shoppers can expect to see price increases on produce “over the next couple of days,” boss Brian Cornell said on Tuesday.

item.title: Trump’s budget cuts threaten AI research, top scientists warn
item.description: Academic research into AI is at risk from President Trump's cost-cutting, critics say.

item.title: Supreme Court Deals Blow to E.P.A. in Dispute Over Federal Water Rules
item.description: The 5-to-4 decision is the latest setback for the agency and could have sweeping implications for curtailing water pollution offshore.

item.title: Trudeau accuses Trump of sidling up to Russia and blasts new tariffs: ‘Donald, this is a very dumb thing to do’
item.description: Canada's outgoing Prime Minister Justin Trudeau vowed retaliatory tariffs on more than $100 billion of American goods in response to Trump's 25% tarif...

item.title: BlackRock Will Buy Panama Canal Ports from CK Hutchison
item.description: The investor group will acquire two ports near the Panama Canal that are owned by CK Hutchison and have been the subject of a dispute between Presiden...

item.title: Trump’s planned crypto reserve pits Bitcoin loyalists against ‘alt-coin’ boosters
item.description: Cameron Winklevoss says “Bitcoin is the only asset that meets the bar for a store of value reserve asset.”

item.title: C.D.C. Sends ‘Disease Detectives’ to Texas for Measles Outbreak
item.description: The Trump administration is stepping in to help Texas respond to the deadly and highly contagious respiratory virus.

item.title: Target has a plan to add $15 billion to its sales by 2030 but it has plenty of problems to fix to get there
item.description: The cheap-chic retailer plans to add $15 billion to its topline.

item.title: Zelensky Offers Terms to Stop Fighting, Assuring U.S. That Ukraine Wants Peace
item.description: “We are working on all possible scenarios to protect Ukraine,” said President Volodymyr Zelensky, whose country was looking to European allies for sup...

item.title: World’s Largest Iceberg Runs Aground
item.description: A massive superberg, four times as big as New York City, has halted east of the southern tip of South America.

item.title: Live Updates: Trudeau, Condemning Trump’s Tariffs, Pledges to ‘Relentlessly Fight’ to Protect Canada’s Economy
item.description: Global markets fell after stiff U.S. tariffs went into effect at midnight, and China and Canada immediately imposed retaliatory measures. Mexico said ...

item.title: Storm Brings Risks of Wildfires, Blizzards and Tornados for much of the U.S.
item.description: An “unusually strong” storm system for March may bring a range of hazards that includes wildfires, blizzards and tornadoes.

item.title: Israel Says It Killed Local Hamas Commander in West Bank
item.description: The raid took place as Israel’s military said it had expanded its operation to crack down on militants in the city of Jenin.
